de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.common
Interface Message

All Known Subinterfaces:
NetMessage
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNetMessage, AbstractOverlayMessage, AbstractReplyMsg, AbstractRequestMsg, AbstractTransMessage, BTMessage, BTPeerMessageBitField, BTPeerMessageCancel, BTPeerMessageChoke, BTPeerMessageHandshake, BTPeerMessageHave, BTPeerMessageInterested, BTPeerMessageKeepAlive, BTPeerMessagePiece, BTPeerMessageRequest, BTPeerMessageUnchoke, BTPeerMessageUninterested, BTPeerToTrackerRequest, BTTrackerToPeerReply, DownloadRequestMsg, DownloadResultMsg, Email, IPv4Message, LookupRequestMsg, LookupResultMsg, SimpleNetMessage, StoreRequestMsg, StoreResultMsg, TCPMessage, UDPMessage
public interface Message

General message interface for all messages exchanged between inside of the same layer in the simulator. Each layer and component will have their own subinterface or implementation of this class.

Version:
3.0, 03.12.2007
Author:
Konstantin Pussep, Sebastian Kaune
